name: Rocket Scales
description: Rocket Scales is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its forest green box and a sturdy helmet addon, this robot stands out among its peers. Its arms and legs are equipped with powerful rockets, allowing it to navigate various terrains with agility. The screen of Rocket Scales is adorned with a mesmerizing snake pattern, adding a touch of elegance to its appearance. This robot is ready to analyze and interpret complex signals with precision, making it an invaluable member of the WebtrES club.
